revised_title: Analytical Solutions for the Ground State of Helium
tldr: The authors present an analytical solution for the first-order perturbation equation of the ground state of the helium atom using perturbation theory. They find that the wavefunction can be expressed as a partial wave expansion in spherical polar coordinates with Legendre polynomials as the angular functions and radial functions including polynomials and exponential integral functions. This solution can be extended to the eigenvalue problem and other higher-order perturbation equations.
